entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:18 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 600 metres in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:18 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023
